problems.title: Blowing Fine Dust
problems.description: White dust (drywall/concrete) shoots out the exhaust.
possible_causes: Using standard filter for fine dust
solution_steps: Standard filters (VF4000) cannot handle drywall dust.
Upgrade to a Fine Dust Filter (VF5000) or HEPA (VF6000).

problems.title: Hose Clogged / Crushed
problems.description: Hose is kinked or suction is low.
solution_steps: Ridgid hoses are tough but can crush. Pop it back out or replace.
Use a stick to clear clogs.
